{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-X6060 |revision=A1 |series=AX6000 |est_release_date=01/07/2018 |fcc_date=06/03/2019 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IRX6060A1 |ic_id=4216A-IRX6060A1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1735, 4AT-18 Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G18AC-TI |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6HE16EWXD-12H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1830 P21, 7CK-02 B2 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1830 P21, 7CK-02 B2 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM84880;BROADCOM (R), BCM84880B0KFSBG, TK1734, QZR-01 P2; |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=2.5G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz FEM;Skyworks;SKY85331-11;85331-11, 283629.1, 1736 MX;4;,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85743;85743, 62476, 1733 MX;8;,,, Bluetooth 5.0 Chip;Cypress;CYW20704;CYW2, 0704UA2, KFFB1G, 737 734;1;,,, Step-Down Converter;M3TEK;MT3128A;MT3128A, 736J2, 06;3; |flags=MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 5.0, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin }}
:• '''4800''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (160MHz chan.) :• '''1150''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (40MHz chan.) = '''''AX6000'' class'''
{{TagLine|AX6000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/ax6000-ultra-wi-fi-router-dirx6060/}} {{see also|D-Link DIR-X9000|ASUS RT-AX88U}} The FCC internal photos show an empty socket where a third BCM43684 radio could be so the design is likely shared with the tri-band [[D-Link DIR-X9000]]. FEMs and filters are present for the missing third radio. ===Announced at CES 2018=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33171-d-link-announces-new-wi-fi-systems-routers-and-cameras-at-ces-2018 ''D-Link Announces New Wi-Fi Systems and Routers'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.cnet.com/news/d-link-ax11000-futuristic-router-promises-extreme-speed-ces-2018/ ''D-Link's AX11000 futuristic router promises extreme speed'' on '''C|Net'''] ===See also=== *[[D-Link DIR-X6060]] - ''AX6000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 6 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port *[[D-Link DIR-X9000]] - ''AX11000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 11 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port :8x high-performance antennas, DLNA, D-Link Wi-Fi App *[[D-Link COVR-2202]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x2 2.4/5GHz, 2x2 5GHz (backhaul), Alexa, $320 (Q2 2018) *[[D-Link COVR-C1203]] - ''AC1200 Dual-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x3 2.4/5GHz, MU-MIMO, Smart Roaming, $250 (Q1 2018) [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2017/33052-d-link-ces-2017-announcements PR] *[[D-Link DIR-2680]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router Powered by McAfee'' :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PXB4395EL (GRX350); WLAN: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] WAV500 *[[Norton Core 517]] - ''AC2600 Norton Core Secure WiFi Router'' __NOTOC__
